metadata.title: CVE-2017-11733 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A null pointer dereference vulnerability was found in the functionstackswap (called from decompileSTACKSWAP) in util/decompile.c in Ming0.4.8, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a craftedfile.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
